    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Summernote

    public class SummernoteBase
extends org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.TextArea
    Wrapper for the Summernote WYSIWYG Editor

    See: http://hackerwins.github.io/summernote/

    Author:
    godi
